channel.title: [PI] Compiler Help [PI]
channel.description: Okay Guys, I Just Got A New Source And I Got WHOLE NEW Files... I Fixed The Compiler In My Source But When I Compile In My Client (Useing Same Code As Source) It Looks Like This: [code]javac: file not found: src\server\event\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Press any key to continue . . .[/code] How exactly Do I Fix That? Any Ideas? This Is My Compiler Code: [code]@echo off COLOR 02 title Runescape Private Server Compiler- Pwn0r "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause[/code] Also How Do I Change The Hit Calculator From x10 To Normal? OMFG FUCKNIG HELP GOD DAMIT! BEEN ASKING THIS FOR 2 DAYS... I Vain I HELPED WITH 1 PROBLEM, HELP ME LAST TIME!

item.title: [PI] Compiler Help [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Abandoned_Dreams Abandoned Dreams
item.description:
@Abandoned_Dreams wrote:

Okay Guys, I Just Got A New Source And I Got WHOLE NEW Files… I Fixed The Compiler In My Source But When I Compile In My Client (Useing Same Code As Source) It Looks Like This:

javac: file not found: src\server\event\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Press any key to continue . . .
How exactly Do I Fix That? Any Ideas?
This Is My Compiler Code:

@echo off COLOR 02 title Runescape Private Server Compiler- Pwn0r "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause
Also How Do I Change The Hit Calculator From x10 To Normal?
OMFG FUCKNIG HELP GOD DAMIT! BEEN ASKING THIS FOR 2 DAYS… I Vain I HELPED WITH 1 PROBLEM, HELP ME LAST TIME!

Read full topic
